attributes.action: Make being non-vaccinated against covid a protected characteristic.
attributes.additional_details:
Choosing not to have a vaccine is a human right, as is making an informed decision free of government interference and propaganda.

When health passports are introduced private business will be used to circumvent human rights and only permit those rights to those that have been vaccinated.

As this is a health issue any attempt to remove the un-vaccinated from society should be protected in the same way other health conditions and disabilities are.
attributes.background: Make being non-vaccinated against covid a protected characteristic under human right and equality law.
